General.Name: Green Energy Enterprises Inc
General.Description: Green Energy Enterprises, Inc. provides integrated aviation/aerospace and legal and medical marijuana services. The company owns and operates two flight and drone training schools in Jacksonville, Florida; a FAA Part 61 flight school; A-Cent, an FAA part 141 flight school; and FAA part 91 commercial air tour operation, computer assisted testing service, and Comira testing facility. The company was formerly known as Quasar Aerospace Industries, Inc. and changed its name to Green Energy Enterprises, Inc. in October 2015. Green Energy Enterprises, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida.
General.Address: 9300 Normandy Boulevard, Jacksonville, FL, United States, 32221
